name: Geometric Mass Torsion Correction
description: Derives mass residuals from the Smallest Torsion (ST) of the knot manifold to refine the fermion mass formula.

hypothesis.H0: Fermion mass residuals are uncorrelated with the Smallest Torsion (ST) of the knot manifold.
hypothesis.H1: The fine structure of fermion masses is determined by the torsion energy of the manifold, following Delta ln m = alpha * ln ST + beta, reflecting non-trivial gauge holonomies.

data_requirements.description: Fermion mass residuals and Smallest Torsion (ST) values from knot databases.

physical_constraints.notes: ST must follow standard mathematical definitions without arbitrary tuning.

test_method: Linear regression on residuals and significance testing.
